Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly benefit your needs. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value and performance. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product for $180. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and bring significant advantages to your use case. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need more information about how this product can be tailored to meet your specific requirements. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
